titleStmt.title: The Church of Rome unmask'd, or her false principles briefly detected with some reasons of so many retaining or returning to communion with her, and the great danger of everlasting destruction, that such persons, especially after separations from her, return to her communion, do run themselves on / written by a learned divine, by way of letter to a friend in the country.
titleStmt.author: Learned divine.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
